original_text: And the Lord came down to see the city and the tower, which the children of men builded.
korean_text: 여호와께서 사람들이 건설하는 그 성읍과 탑을 보려고 내려오셨더라

sentences.original_text: to see the city and the tower
sentences.korean_translation: 그 도시와 그 탑을 보기 위해

sentences.original_text: which the children of men builded
